articles.title: Video: President Joe Biden's full prime-time speech to the nation - CNN Video
articles.description: President Joe Biden took aim at former President Donald Trump and what he called the extremism of so-called MAGA Republicans during a rare prime time speech to the nation.

articles.author: Steve Almasy, CNN
articles.title: Serena and Venus Williams bounced from doubles' play at US Open
articles.description: Serena Williams' illustrious doubles career has likely come to an end after she and her sister Venus fell in straight sets to the Czech duo of Linda Nosková and Lucie Hradecká in the first round of the US Open at Arthur Ashe Stadium.

articles.title: Trump-backed Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate suing Jan. 6 committee over deposition demands

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, Phil Mattingly and Kaitlan Collins, CNN
articles.title: Biden to issue a warning over American democracy in rare prime-time speech: 'We have to defend it'
articles.description: A pair of fiery speeches inside packed gymnasiums over the past week left even some White House aides surprised at President Joe Biden's new-found sense of electricity.
articles.content:

articles.title: Opinion: How Biden can avoid Clinton's 'basket of deplorables' fiasco

articles.author: Jessica Dean and Daniella Diaz, CNN
articles.title: McCarthy to call on Biden to apologize after 'semi-fascism' remark
articles.description: House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy will call on President Joe Biden to apologize for invoking fascism to describe the ideology of former President Donald Trump and his supporters, according to excerpts from a speech he will give later today.

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Trump's legal gambits offer fresh revelations and deepen his political risk
articles.description: Donald Trump's scattershot defense in the weeks since FBI agents descended on his Mar-a-Lago resort has only exposed the depth of the mess he faces over his refusal to return classified documents that led to an unprecedented search of an ex-president's home.

articles.author: By Tierney Sneed, Kara Scannell, Adrienne Vogt, Aditi Sangal, Elise Hammond and Maureen Chowdhury, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Trump's special master bid
articles.description: A federal judge has scheduled a hearing to consider former President Donald Trump's request for a special master to oversee the FBI's review of materials seized in the search of his Mar-a-Lago estate. Follow here for live news updates.

articles.title: Live updates: Russia's war in Ukraine
